paragraphs.text:
%spark

val textFile = sc.textFile("hdfs://master:9000/bda_course/exercise01/NASA_access_log_Jul95.txt")
val counts = textFile.
                map(line => parse(line)).
                filter(_.isDefined).
                map(_.get).
                map(logInfo => (logInfo.returnCode, 1)).
                reduceByKey(_ + _)


println("")
counts.collect().foreach(println(_))
